title: HigLabo MailAgent
description:
After struggling with email overload and chaotic invoice management, I built an AI-Agent to simplify these challenges and boost productivity.

Here’s how it works:
✅ Automatic Replies: The AI drafts professional, ready-to-send responses for important emails, saving you time and effort.
✅ Invoice Extraction: No more manual entry. The tool detects, extracts, and organizes invoice details!

With these features, you can eliminate repetitive tasks, reduce stress, and focus on what truly matters.
